file_content.text: We're not like the Eidolon, right? We're different?
Do you think I'm an assassin?
Because we hunt?
You kill people for money. How is that different?
Maybe it isn't.
[Shrug]
Don't get philosophical on me.
Not worth dwelling on.
Sorry. It's this stupid place. I never should've come back to Nar Shaddaa.
What do you mean?
Come again?
I mean assassins kill people for money. You kill people for money. How are you different from the Eidolon?
I kill people who deserve to die.
Our targets are scum.
I hope that's true--because otherwise, that makes us the bad guys too.
I can choose to bring them in alive.
I have other options.
I wonder if that's any better. Maybe it's worse.
Maybe I'm not.
[Shrug]
Yeah, that's what I'm afraid of.
What difference does it make?
Who cares?
I suppose in the end it doesn't. That's what I'm afraid of.
I guess we still have work to do. I hope the rest of our targets are nothing like this guy.
Shall we get out of here? I want to get as far away from Nar Shaddaa as possible.
Right.
Told you this place was ugly and sleazy.
You kidding? This place is great.
I love Nar Shaddaa.
Certain type of people definitely love it.
Whatever.
I'm really starting to wonder why I hang around with you.
Solash is waiting for us to deliver the Eidolon at the spaceport. Let's get rid of him and get outta here.
The Eidolon's gotta pay for what he did to Anuli.
What were those things?
I can't believe he's gone. I never should've left him. It's all my fault! Again!
We can still avenge him.
Don't shed tears, shed blood.
Yes. I want to make the Eidolon pay!
Try to keep it together.
Stay calm.
Sorry... I'll be okay... just give me a sec....
He's nothing. Only the Eidolon matters.
Forget the kid.
Well, he mattered to me!
Look! The holocommunicator on Gele'ren's desk is blinking. Maybe he's still alive, sending us a message.
Anuli! Oh no! No!
The Eidolon may still be here.
Stay sharp.
Right. Okay. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, Mako.
We're too late....
He just wanted a better life. He never hurt anybody....
Pull it together, Mako.
Stay calm.
Come on. We'll avenge him.
The person who did this dies.
Yes... yes, that's what we should do. That's what we have to do.
What's our next step?
He's dead, get over it.
Keep moving.
You are such a--
I don't have time for this.
Need to keep moving.
I'm sorry that my friend's death is an inconvenience for you!
Fine! Don't mind anybody else's feelings. They're not important. So what now, "boss"?
Can you tell what killed Anuli?
Check for cause of death.
I can't really tell. The look on his face--
We need to find Gele'ren.
Where's Anuli's boss?
He's probably hiding. Assuming he's still--
Now the Eidolon dies.
Vengeance.
You took the words right out of my mouth. I want to get that--
What was that?
Not a bad bit of work, if I do say so myself.
Guard those codes with your life. We're definitely gonna need them.
Oh no! Hope Zee's still on Nar Shaddaa. Let's hurry and check the spaceport.
If we find Zee, we find those codes.
As bounty hunter rivals go, those Ugnaughts were a pretty weird bunch.
Tough little buggers, aren't they?
Hope those Ugnaughts haven't finished their new war droid. We should hurry to the Evocii Slums.
We're a great team!
Wow! Now that was a huge explosion!
Glad that weapons plant is in the upper industrial area. Not too many people around.
Hope Gele'ren's in a good mood. His office should still be in Club Vertica on the Promenade.
I'm glad to be back on Nar Shaddaa.
That did it! Let's get back to Gele'ren and see what he thinks of our handiwork.
Network Access? No way! I love that place! It's slicer heaven!
We gotta hurry! Anuli needs us!
Well, I suppose we should check out the rest of our targets. I don't want to stay here any longer than I have to.
I'm glad he was our last target. I've sorta lost the taste for the Great Hunt.
